openGraph.title: BPM Tapper
openGraph.ogTitle: BPM Tapper - Compete in Tap Speed Battles
openGraph.description: Measure your BPM by tapping and compete with friends for faster records. Perfect for score challenges, reaction-speed battles, and shareable tap speed competitions.

title: BPM Tapper
description: Tap your rhythm to calculate the average BPM.
hint: Tap the button in time with the beat.
helper: Tap at least twice to see the average BPM.
